title: 820-3462 no backlight
message: Its a previous repair attempt, initially it wasn't turning on, fixed it and now there is no backlight, i checked backlight enable and that was low, so i tracked it and found that smc_lid is around 1.9v, removed r5050 and its a  partial short, diode mode measurement is 0.081 and i have already reflowed smc and removed q5701 and nothing has changed so far, any other ideas apart from reballing or changing smc?

title: 820-3462 no backlight
message:
Remove C5050 and check if R5071 is OK.
If all correct, remove SMC and check again.
Probably short will go then, meaning bad SMC...

title: 820-3462 no backlight
message: Already did that, i think its smc and i don't have stencils for it

title: 820-3462 no backlight
message:
It has aprox 150 balls.
I did more than one at hand...
Use 0.35mm, but even 0.4-0.45mm works.

title: 820-3462 no backlight
message: Will smc from 820-3332 work?? The schematics says they are same, but now board is not even turning on

title: 820-3462 no backlight
message: You MUST take SMC from the same donor board model...
